text: “Khea klaw wa xo phracea hæng khaphraxngkh pord xphaythosʹ kæ kha phraxngkh læa kæ phi chay khxng kha phraxngkh dwy læa pord di thrng hı phwk kha phra xngkhu khea xyu nı khwam xendu metta khxng phraxngkh theid læa phraxngkh nan khux phu thi thrng xendu metta ying kwa phu xendu metta thanghlay”
